author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removed all legacy CUDA ECAL modules and the corresponding data formats.

- Unpacker
- Uncalibrated RecHit producer (Multifit)
- Uncalibrated RecHit producer Phase 2 (Weights method)
- RecHit producer
- Corresponding ES producers
- Corresponding CPU to GPU and vice-versa data format converters
- ECAL and Calo common CUDA data formats

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Remove legacy CUDA ECAL code
